Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Tail assembly rivet loosening. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 03/07/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
